wikipedia_page.main:
Matthew Cooper (born 1 July 1994) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Elgin City, as a defender.
He began his career with Inverness Caledonian Thistle.

response: * Matthew Cooper, American ambient recording artist better known as Eluvium

* Matthew Cooper (rugby union) (born 1966), New Zealand rugby union footballer
* Matthew Cooper, a fictional character from the video game ArmA II (2009)
* Matthew Cooper, a fictional character from the television series Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman (1993–1998)
